)
Title MR14: "Semantic technologies applied to an efficient management of Research Groups"
- Description MR14: This work will apply semantic technologies (RDF, SPARQL, mappings) to the document flow (papers, reports, requests, etc.) of a real research group. This work will provide a migration guideline that could be applied to any traditional organization interested in adopting semantic technologies. The student should have a basic knowledge of semantic web technologies.
- Funding schema: perhaps OEG funding.
Maria Poveda
speaker: SYSTEM
